mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_Info (stuname, profession, date, sex, id_num, total_score, note) VALUES (#{stuName}, #{profession}, #{date}, #{sex}, #{idNum}, ${totalScore}, #{note})
mapper.select:
SELECT stuid stuId, stuname stuName, profession, date, sex, id_num idNum, TOTAL_SCORE totalScore, note FROM student_Info
WHERE
stuname LIKE "%"#{stuName}"%"
AND
profession = #{profession}
